name: [Virtual Reality] The Loneliest Game Of Ping Pong of All Time
name_original: [Virtual Reality] The Loneliest Game Of Ping Pong of All Time
description:
Do you not have any friends? Do you constantly struggle with the idea of having to interact with another living being to gain some enjoyment out of your lonely life? Do you feel that social interactions are a hoax created by the government to force people to work together to survive? Well boy howdy do I have the game for you!

INTRODUCING: THE LONELIEST GAME OF PING PONG OF ALL TIME!!!

The only game where you spend the entire game playing with yourself, by yourself. Bask in your utter loneliness and solitude with this game of ping pong.

The Loneliest Game of Ping Pong of All Time: the only game where you truly accept how no one wants to play video games with you because they're too busy playing another game that you don't really like but you gotta play it cuz how else are your friends gonna recognize your existence? I mean COME ON GUYS!! I JUST WANNA PLAY SOME-

WARNING: This game is a VR game. You will need a VR headset or some emulation of it to play!
